name: Lightfall Remake
description:
Lightfall is an upcoming game from a small Indie studio based in Quebec City. The project was successfully funded through Kickstarter last year and is currently being polished for a future release. The game is awesome and I wanted to make my own take by turning their stunning environment into pixel art.

This prototype level was about testing some new Unity and C# concepts and writing comprehensive code. I used some intermediate material such as event delegates, coroutines, interfaces, extensions and even some plug-ins (InControl for usb controllers).

*Please note that all sound assets are from the Unity Store, the artistic direction comes from the game Lightfall and is copywrited, I received approval from the team to use their world with a twist. This is a school project, the prototype is only for personal use.
